rules: Use h-full on children to ensure they stretch.
Never fill 100% of the grid perfectly.

spacing.rule: Containers with borders must have internal padding (p-6 or p-8).

voice_fab.description: Floating Action Button for Voice Input
voice_fab.classes: fixed bottom-8 right-8 h-16 w-16 rounded-full bg-gradient-to-r from-orange-500 to-pink-500 text-white shadow-2xl flex items-center justify-center animate-pulse-slow z-50 cursor-pointer hover:scale-110 transition-transform

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlays on solid backgrounds to prevent 'digital flatness'.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Layered shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-2xl for floating elements.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid borders with 10% opacity on dark backgrounds, 5% on light.

hero_bg.description: Abstract colorful 3D shapes for dashboard background or hero section

login_hero.description: Indian shopkeeper context for login page

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for normal text.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-offset-2) on all interactive elements.
accessibility.voice_support: All icons must have aria-labels. Voice feedback should be visually indicated (waveforms).

instructions_to_main_agent.general: Do not build a generic admin panel. Build a 'Cockpit' for a business owner. It should feel empowering.
instructions_to_main_agent.voice_integration: The voice feature is central. The FAB (Floating Action Button) should be prominent. When active, show a visualizer overlay.
instructions_to_main_agent.charts: Use Recharts. Style them with gradients (defs/linearGradient). Do not use flat colors for areas.
instructions_to_main_agent.language: Ensure the UI supports dynamic switching or mixed content (English UI + Hindi Voice/Text).
instructions_to_main_agent.theme: Default to Light Mode with 'Vibrant' accents. Dark mode is secondary.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
